summary: Modders Resource for the Credo - WIP
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Thread%20Banners/Credo01.png[/img]

Modders Resource Torrent for the *Currently Postponed* [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/798555-credo-wip/]Credo - WIP[/url]

Unfortunately due to my real life employment situation, I have decided that I am currently unable to continue with the Credo WIP.

Whilst I fully intend to return to this project when the circumstances are better, I have also decided to upload a (fairly unsorted) Torrent of all my work to date as well as most of the Witcher 2 assets I was using/planning to use.

I only ask a simple favour, along with crediting CD Projekt RED and my self if you make use of any of these assets, I would greatly appreciate that you post your plans or finished articles on the original [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/798555-credo-wip/]Credo - WIP[/url] thread.

This is purely a favour to me, as I would very much like to see what great things the community creates from these resources

Thank you all for your support and I will hopefully be back soonish to carry on with the project#

IMPORTANT !!!

Permission must be requested from Nivea, if you intend to use any of her models/textures... the ones included in the package are the fur shoulder mesh and texture..[/center]
author: CD Projeckt - Actus Reus
